panic_alerts.panic_error_alert: Sorry, emergency not triggered. You need to long press the button for 3 seconds
panic_alerts.panic_success_alert: A message has been sent to the security team.
panic_alerts.info: After pressing SOS, notifications will be sent out to our administrators and a member of our security team will speak to you.
panic_alerts.sos_disclaimer: * Only use this service incase of extreme emergency. Please use customer support or incident report form for non-emergencies
panic_alerts.sos_feedback: Please stand by, we are currently requesting for help
panic_alerts.user_message: has initiated an emergency support request. Please confirm the person is safe and the emergency is resolved.
